attributes.action: stop people with Munchausens by internet from posting on forums.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Online Support for People with Illness - The Internet is a medium of choice for millions of people who need health-related information. Medical websites have multiplied exponentially over the past several years. Thousands of virtual support groups have sprung. The eventual discovery of the deceptions can be devastating. One group member called it "emotional rape" to have cared so deeply about a person who lied to her and others from his first post on.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
